profile:
The Plumbing Expert Mechanical Services, Inc. is pleased to offer Plumbing, Filtration and Drain services around the GTA. An honest plumbing company based on a good reputation. What we offer is plumbers! Not technicians! We have over 14 years of experience and service to the Greater Toronto area and know what it takes get the job done right in the most cost effective way possible. We live in your neighborhood and understand your needs. We are a proud Canadian owned and operated which keeps us grounded and accountable. To earn your trust, we fix the problem the first time. We take pride in all our work including: 
• Low water pressure 
• Household Leaks 
• Appliance Installation
• Plumbing Fixtures Repair & Installation
• Sewage & Sump Pumps 
• Drain Cleaning & Repairs 
• Water Quality & Filtration systems
• Water Conservation 
• Custom homes 
• Renovation 
• Remodelling 
• Roughing in

profile:
Watermaker began business in 1974 in Orangeville, Ontario as a water treatment company. Initially, specializing in residential and commercial delivery of water treatment salt, we quickly moved into the water treatment equipment market. In early 1975 we became an EcoWater dealer representing the world’s largest privately owned manufacturer of water treatment equipment. We rapidly gained expertise in all areas of water treatment and we currently specialize in water softeners, iron and tannin removal, drinking water systems and ultraviolet sterilization for residential and commercial applications. In 1986 we recognized the opportunity to expand into the emerging bottled water industry using the experience gained through years in the water treatment business. To create a niche in the market we began bottling reverse osmosis water in 11 L and 18 L polycarbonate bottles becoming the first to use this technology in the commercial large bottle format. Over the years the company expanded into spring water and distilled water to deliver its current selection of water products throughout the Greater Toronto Area.


In the ongoing evolvement of our business and in response to local demand for our products and services, we established a retail operation in 1987 at 121 First St., in Orangeville. This led to further involvement with the community of Orangeville and the surrounding areas, giving us the opportunity to provide a very personalized walk-in service to new and existing customers. Watermaker’s retail location offers serve yourself tap service on reverse osmosis water as well as ready filled containers, in assorted sizes, of reverse osmosis, spring, and distilled water. We stock a variety of parts and accessories to service all-out water softeners and other water treatment systems and our friendly, knowledgeable and experienced staff is there to serve and assist you with all your questions and needs.

In November 2007 we moved into a new state of the art facility at 16 Shannon Crt., on the outskirts of Orangeville. The new 13,000 sq. ft. building houses the water bottling plant, water treatment services and warehousing for all inventories.
services:
Residential and Commercial Water Treatment Systems
Supply, install and repair
Water Softeners
Iron Removers
Tannin Removers
Ultraviolet Water Sterilizers
Reverse Osmosis Drinking Water Systems

And more

profile:
Aquapura is a Canadian company that has been providing water treatment products and services to all over Ontario for over 25 years!. We are proud to be a part of Canada and it’s heritage. We are a company that strives in its quality and recognition of what our customers want.

Since our expansion to Mulmur, Aquapura Water Products has been increasing our service quality and lines of product. We are proud to offer water softeners to the Mulmur, Mansfield and Creemore area. The contious sucess has allowed us to expand and we are even installing water softeners in Shelburne, Stayner, Angus and the surrounding areas.
